instructions.es: Continúe ligeramente a la izquierda hacia Destination 1

instructions.fr: Continuer légèrement à gauche en direction de Destination 1
instructions.id: Lanjutkan agak ke kiri menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Continua a sinistra leggermente verso Destination 1
instructions.pl: Kontynuuj łagodnie w lewo w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Continue suave à esquerda sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Continue ligeiramente à esquerda em direção a Destination 1
instructions.tr: Destination 1 istikametinde hafif sol yönde devam et
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь плавно ліворуч у напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Chạy tiếp bên trái nghiêng về hướng Destination 1
